adjectives.description: checkered (comparative more checkered, superlative most checkered)

entries.meaning: Divided into squares, or into light and dark patches.
(figurative) Changeable; inconsistent; having variations or uncertainty; marked by many problems or failures.
examples: Long suspected of running the Tangiers without a gaming license, yesterday's hearing was to determine whether someone with Rothstein's checkered past history was qualified to officially hold a top gaming post.

entries.meaning: simple past tense and past participle of checker
